Abilities.Q: Holy Light : Heal target ally for 380 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 190 Health.
Abilities.Z: Holy Radiance : Heal all allies in a line for 160 Health, dealing 160 damage to enemies.
Abilities.E: Hammer of Justice : Deal 114 damage and Stun the target for 0.75 seconds.
Abilities.D: Devotion : Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 amor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, uther can heal allies with Flash of Ligh.

Heroic Abilities.R1: Divine Shield : Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
Heroic Abilities.R2: Divine Storm : Deal 187 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Tier 1.Name: Silver Touch
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Reduce damage from Heroic sources with devotion. 
			Reward : After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. 
			Reward : After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%

Tier 1.Name: Wave of Light
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. 
			Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 1 second. 
			Passive : Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 8 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

Tier 1.Name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
Tier 1.Description:
Quest : Basic Attack enemies 75 times. 
			Reward : Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds. 
			Passive : Basic Attacks restore 1.50% of Uther's maximum Mana
